description:
> `Description`: `create one` 

This endpoint creates a new document with the given [STUDY_ID].

> `Request`: (Http Method: [POST]) https://cans.cachet.dk:443/api/studies/{{STUDY_ID}}/documents

This request must be authenticated using a HTTP OAuth 2.0 Authentication header.

> `Response`:

- On success, a JSON object is returned with a created document.
- On failure status code `400` (bad request) is returned.
- On failure status code `401` (unauthorized) is returned.
- On failure status code `500` (internal server error) is returned.
